text: Bɨ ogɨnap ned yɨp paklɨnɨg gelak, bɨ bel anɨb ak mɨdɨl, kasɨn gɨlek. Pen chɨlop paklɨnɨgel agɨl gos ak ma nɨŋɨd anɨgɨlek. Yad kɨlop gos tep yɨbɨl nɨŋɨd tep apin ak pen, yad nokom mel. Binɨb Juda mel man ke okok mɨdɨl, kɨli Klays binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpal okok, kɨli abe kɨlop bel gos tep yɨbɨl nɨŋɨd tep apal.
